newsitem.title: UK: Mondas to join UK's AIM market with 4.5mln stg tag.
newsitem.headline: Mondas to join UK's AIM market with 4.5mln stg tag.

text.p: Software group Mondas Plc said on Wednesday it planned to list on the London Stock Exchange's Alternative Investment Market (AIM) by means of a placing of ordinary shares at 75p, valuing it at 4.52 million stg.

Mondas, developer of Radica business management software, will use the 909,000 stg net proceeds from the issue to expand its sales and marketing capability, fund capital expenditure and growth and to provide working capital.
Mondas said joining AIM would raise its profile and enhance its reputation with potential customers. Advisor to the placing is John East and Partners and the broker is Townsley and Co.
